com.voxelgameslib.voxelgameslib.phase

Class TimedPhase

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.voxelgameslib.voxelgameslib.phase.AbstractPhase
      • com.voxelgameslib.voxelgameslib.phase.TimedPhase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Phase, Tickable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GracePhase

    public abstract class TimedPhase
extends AbstractPhase
    A special Phase that automatically ends after a specified amount of ticks.
